product.title: NOBRAND Flat Iron Comb Attachment Clip On, Flat Iron Hair Straightener Comb Attachment, Comb Attachment for Flat Iron
product.title_excluding_brand: Flat Iron Comb Attachment Clip On, Flat Iron Hair Straightener Comb Attachment, Comb Attachment for Flat Iron
product.description: A comb is a simple yet essential grooming tool. Typically made of plastic, wood, or horn, it features evenly spaced teeth designed to detangle hair, distribute natural oils, and style locks. Whether used for daily hair care, taming unruly strands, or preparing elaborate hairstyles, a comb helps keep hair neat and healthy.
product.description_html: A comb is a simple yet essential grooming tool. Typically made of plastic, wood, or horn, it features evenly spaced teeth designed to detangle hair, distribute natural oils, and style locks. Whether used for daily hair care, taming unruly strands, or preparing elaborate hairstyles, a comb helps keep hair neat and healthy.
product.description_full:
A comb is a simple yet essential grooming tool. Typically made of plastic, wood, or horn, it features evenly spaced teeth designed to detangle hair, distribute natural oils, and style locks. Whether used for daily hair care, taming unruly strands, or preparing elaborate hairstyles, a comb helps keep hair neat and healthy. * Combs are usually flat - shaped tools with a series of evenly - spaced teeth, which are designed to glide smoothly through hair, effortlessly detangling knots.
 * Made from various materials such as plastic, wood, or even antler, combs offer different textures and benefits; wooden combs, for example, are gentle and help reduce static.
 * Many combs feature ergonomic handles, providing a comfortable grip that allows for easy maneuvering while styling or grooming hair.
product.description_full_html:
A comb is a simple yet essential grooming tool. Typically made of plastic, wood, or horn, it features evenly spaced teeth designed to detangle hair, distribute natural oils, and style locks. Whether used for daily hair care, taming unruly strands, or preparing elaborate hairstyles, a comb helps keep hair neat and healthy.
  • Combs are usually flat - shaped tools with a series of evenly - spaced teeth, which are designed to glide smoothly through hair, effortlessly detangling knots.
  • Made from various materials such as plastic, wood, or even antler, combs offer different textures and benefits; wooden combs, for example, are gentle and help reduce static.
  • Many combs feature ergonomic handles, providing a comfortable grip that allows for easy maneuvering while styling or grooming hair.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
